hockey_conditioning.title: Ice Warrior Conditioning
hockey_conditioning.description: High-intensity hockey-specific conditioning workout focusing on explosive power and endurance

warmup.description: Side-to-side steps simulating hockey skating motion, engaging core and legs
warmup.tips: Keep knees bent, chest up, simulate the skating stride

warmup.description: Arm circles and crossovers mimicking stick handling movements
warmup.tips: Keep movements fluid, engage shoulders and core

warmup.description: Forward and lateral lunges to activate leg muscles used in skating
warmup.tips: Deep lunges, control the movement, feel the stretch

mainWorkout.description: Deep squats with explosive upward movement simulating hockey acceleration
mainWorkout.tips: Explode up from the bottom, land softly

mainWorkout.description: Single-leg balance holds simulating the hockey stop position
mainWorkout.tips: Engage core, keep knee aligned over toe

mainWorkout.description: High-intensity running intervals simulating game pace
mainWorkout.tips: All-out effort during work periods

mainWorkout.description: Push-ups with hand placement changes simulating puck battles
mainWorkout.tips: Strong core, change hand positions between reps

mainWorkout.description: Rotational core exercises mimicking slapshot motion
mainWorkout.tips: Control the rotation, feel it in your core

cooldown.description: Deep hip flexor and groin stretches important for hockey players
cooldown.tips: Hold each stretch for 30-45 seconds

cooldown.description: Slow walking with deep breathing to bring heart rate down
cooldown.tips: Focus on breathing and recovery

hockey_conditioning.title: Rink Ready Cardio Blast
hockey_conditioning.description: Intense cardiovascular workout designed for hockey game endurance

warmup.description: Full body dynamic movements preparing for high intensity
warmup.tips: Gradually increase intensity, activate all muscle groups

mainWorkout.description: Progressive distance sprints simulating shift changes
mainWorkout.tips: Touch each line, explosive starts and stops

mainWorkout.description: Low squat jumps simulating goalie butterfly saves
mainWorkout.tips: Stay low, quick explosive movements

mainWorkout.description: Modified burpees with hockey-specific movements
mainWorkout.tips: Add stick handling motion during the pushup

cooldown.description: Comprehensive stretching routine for hockey players
cooldown.tips: Focus on hips, groin, and shoulders
